name: cobol
description: COBOL, JCL, PL/I & DIR syntax support

coboleditor.copybookdirs.description: COBOL CopyBook directories to search into

coboleditor.copybooks_nested.markdownDescription: nest copybooks in outline view (restart required)
coboleditor.copybooks_nested.title: nest copybooks in outline view (restart require)

coboleditor.cache_metadata.title: search inside copybook references and more
enumDescriptions: Save as much metadata as possible in .vscode_cobol directory

coboleditor.fileformat_strategy.title: always_fixed or normal
enumDescriptions: Assume source code if fixed format
Determine source code format or configure it

items.title: List of properties to match file format

enumDescriptions: source code format fixed (classic COBOL margins)
source code format variable (no right margin)

coboleditor.fileformat.description: An array of filenames/patterns and its associated source formmat

coboleditor.outline.markdownDescription: Configure or disable outline for COBOL
coboleditor.outline.description: on=everything, partial=no paragraphs, skeleton=basic structure and off
enumDescriptions: Scans everything in the source (can be costly)
Scans very little but might be enough for basic navigation

coboleditor.pre_parse_line_limit.title: Set pre-parse line limit
coboleditor.pre_parse_line_limit.description: Set pre-parse line limit, used to determine if source is COBOL or a CopyBook.

coboleditor.linter.title: Enable basic linting
coboleditor.linter.description: Enable basic linting (limited to sections/paragraph use)

coboleditor.line_comment.title: Replace standard comment in/out with COBOL specific
coboleditor.line_comment.description: Replace standard comment in/out with COBOL specific

coboleditor.parser_hint_directory.title: A directory that contains json files to be used a hints

coboleditor.mfunit.diagnostic.color.title: Enable ANSI color
coboleditor.mfunit.diagnostic.color.description: Enable ANSI color when using mfunit in terminal

coboleditor.intellisense_include_unchang.title: Include result unchanged in intellisense results
coboleditor.intellisense_include_unchang.description: Include result unchanged in intellisense results (default true)

coboleditor.intellisense_include_camalca.title: Include camalcase in intellisense results
coboleditor.intellisense_include_camalca.description: Include camalcase in intellisense results (default false)

coboleditor.intellisense_include_upperca.title: Include uppercase results in intellisense results
coboleditor.intellisense_include_upperca.description: Include uppercase results in intellisense results (default false)

coboleditor.intellisense_include_lowerca.title: Include lowercase results in intellisense results
coboleditor.intellisense_include_lowerca.description: Include lowercase results in intellisense results (default false)

coboleditor.intellisense_item_limit.title: Max number of items to return
coboleditor.intellisense_item_limit.description: Max number of items to return (default 120)

coboleditor.process_metadata_cache_on_st.title: Process metadata cache on startup
coboleditor.process_metadata_cache_on_st.description: Process metadata cache on extension load (default false)

coboleditor.parse_copybooks_for_referenc.title: Parse copybook for reference
coboleditor.parse_copybooks_for_referenc.description: Parse copybook for reference [WARNING: use with care] (default false)

commands.title: COBOL: Process files in workspace for metadata

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd src && npm run compile && cd .. && webpack --mode production
scripts.webpack: cd src && npm run compile && cd .. && webpack --mode development
